languages.text: {name} фон Валанциус взял{mf||а} себе процент десятины за помощь Арбитес. На эти ресурсы была возведена пустотная станция "Блеск Династии", ставшая подлинным украшением Простора Коронус. Это монументальное сооружение просуществовало еще сотни лет после смерти свое{mf|го|ей} создател{mf|я|ьницы}.

{name} von Valancius took a percentage of the tithe as payment for {mf|his|her} help to the Arbites. The resources were used to construct a void station, the Gem of the Dynasty, a true ornament of the Koronus Expanse. The monumental structure remained standing for centuries after its creator's death.
languages.original_text: {name} фон Валанциус взял{mf||а} себе процент десятины за помощь Арбитес. На эти ресурсы была возведена пустотная станция "Блеск Династии", ставшая подлинным украшением Простора Коронус. Это монументальное сооружение просуществовало еще сотни лет после смерти свое{mf|го|ей} создател{mf|я|ьницы}.

traits.locale_text: {name} von Valancius took a percentage of the tithe in payment for {mf|his|her} help to the Arbites. The resources were used to construct a void station, the Gem of the Dynasty, which truly became an adornment of the Koronus Expanse. The monumental structure survived for centuries after the death of its creator.

{name} von Valancius took a percentage of the tithe in payment for {mf|his|her} help to the Arbites. The resources were used to construct a void station, the Gem of the Dynasty, which truly became an adornment of the Koronus Expanse. The monumental structure survived for centuries after the death of its creator.

{name} von Valancius took a percentage of the tithe as payment for {mf|his|her} help to the Arbites. The resources were used to construct a void station, the Gem of the Dynasty, a true ornament of the Koronus Expanse. The monumental structure remained standing for centuries after its creators death.

The resources were used to construct a void station, the Gem of the Dynasty, a true ornament of the Koronus Expanse. The monumental structure remained standing for centuries after its creators death.

{name} von Valancius took a percentage of the tithe as payment for {mf|his|her} help to the Arbites. The resources were used to construct a void station, the Gem of the Dynasty, a true ornament of the Koronus Expanse. The monumental structure remained standing for centuries after its creator's death.

{name} von Valancius took a percentage of the tithe as payment for {mf|his|her} help to the Arbites. The resources were used to construct a void station, the Gem of the Dynasty, a true ornament of the Koronus Expanse. The monumental structure remained standing for centuries after its creator's death.

languages.text: {name} von Valancius beanspruchte einen prozentualen Anteil des Zehnts für {mf|seine|ihre} Unterstützung der Arbites. Die Ressourcen wurden für den Bau einer Leerenstation verwendet, das Juwel der Dynastie, ein wahres Schmuckstück der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Das gewaltige Konstrukt stand noch Jahrhunderte nach dem Tod {mf|seines Schöpfers|seiner Schöpferin}.
languages.original_text: {name} von Valancius took a percentage of the tithe as payment for {mf|his|her} help to the Arbites. The resources were used to construct a void station, the Gem of the Dynasty, a true ornament of the Koronus Expanse. The monumental structure remained standing for centuries after its creator's death.

traits.locale_text: {name} von Valancius beanspruchte einen prozentualen Anteil des Zehnts für {mf|seine|ihre} Unterstützung der Arbites. Die Ressourcen wurden für den Bau einer Leerenstation verwendet, das Juwel der Dynastie, ein wahres Schmuckstück der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Das gewaltige Konstrukt stand noch Jahrhunderte nach dem Tod {mf|seines Schöpfers|seiner Schöpferin}.

languages.text: {name} von Valancius s'arrogea un pourcentage de la dîme en paiement de l'aide qu'{mf|il|elle} avait apporté à l'Arbites, et s'en servit pour faire bâtir une station spatiale, la Gemme de la Dynastie, véritable joyau des Étendues de Koronus. La structure monumentale demeura intacte bien des siècles après la mort de {mf|son créateur|sa créatrice}.
languages.original_text: {name} von Valancius took a percentage of the tithe as payment for {mf|his|her} help to the Arbites. The resources were used to construct a void station, the Gem of the Dynasty, a true ornament of the Koronus Expanse. The monumental structure remained standing for centuries after its creator's death.

traits.locale_text: {name} von Valancius s'arrogea un pourcentage de la dîme en paiement de l'aide qu'{mf|il|elle} avait apporté à l'Arbites, et s'en servit pour faire bâtir une station spatiale, la Gemme de la Dynastie, véritable joyau des Étendues de Koronus. La structure monumentale demeura intacte bien des siècles après la mort de {mf|son créateur|sa créatrice}.

languages.text: 作为协助帝国法务部的报酬，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯抽走了部分什一税资源。后来，这些资源用来建造“王朝珍宝”这座虚空星站，它成了整个科罗努斯扩区真正的辉煌。即便这座星站的众多建造者去世之后，那些巍峨的建筑也依然挺立了许多世纪，屹立不倒。
languages.original_text: {name} von Valancius took a percentage of the tithe as payment for {mf|his|her} help to the Arbites. The resources were used to construct a void station, the Gem of the Dynasty, a true ornament of the Koronus Expanse. The monumental structure remained standing for centuries after its creator's death.

traits.locale_text: 作为协助帝国法务部的报酬，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯抽走了部分什一税资源。后来，这些资源用来建造“王朝珍宝”这座虚空星站，它成了整个科罗努斯扩区真正的辉煌。即便这座星站的众多建造者去世之后，那些巍峨的建筑也依然挺立了许多世纪，屹立不倒。

languages.text: {name} von Valancius conservó un porcentaje del diezmo como pago por su ayuda al Arbites. Los recursos se utilizaron para construir una estación del vacío: la Joya de la Dinastía, un verdadero adorno para la Extensión de Koronus. La monumental estructura permaneció intacta siglos después de la muerte de su creador{mf||a}.
languages.original_text: {name} von Valancius took a percentage of the tithe as payment for {mf|his|her} help to the Arbites. The resources were used to construct a void station, the Gem of the Dynasty, a true ornament of the Koronus Expanse. The monumental structure remained standing for centuries after its creator's death.

traits.locale_text: {name} von Valancius conservó un porcentaje del diezmo como pago por su ayuda al Arbites. Los recursos se utilizaron para construir una estación del vacío: la Joya de la Dinastía, un verdadero adorno para la Extensión de Koronus. La monumental estructura permaneció intacta siglos después de la muerte de su creador{mf||a}.

languages.text: {name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、高等裁定局への支援の代価として、租税の一部を受け取った。その資源は、「王朝の宝石」と呼ばれるヴォイドステーションの建設に使われ、それはコロヌス・エクスパンスの真の装飾とも言うべき存在となった。その記念碑的な構造物は、創設者の死後も何世紀にもわたって存在し続けた。
languages.original_text: {name} von Valancius took a percentage of the tithe as payment for {mf|his|her} help to the Arbites. The resources were used to construct a void station, the Gem of the Dynasty, a true ornament of the Koronus Expanse. The monumental structure remained standing for centuries after its creator's death.

traits.locale_text: {name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、高等裁定局への支援の代価として、租税の一部を受け取った。その資源は、「王朝の宝石」と呼ばれるヴォイドステーションの建設に使われ、それはコロヌス・エクスパンスの真の装飾とも言うべき存在となった。その記念碑的な構造物は、創設者の死後も何世紀にもわたって存在し続けた。

languages.text: {name} von Valancius, Yargıcılara ettiği yardımın bedeli olarak aşarın bir yüzdesini aldı. Bu kaynaklar, Koronus Enginliği'nin gerçek bir ziyneti olan Hanedanlık Mücevheri adlı bir uzay istasyonunun inşasında kullanıldı. Bu heybetli yapı, yaratıcısının ölümünden sonra asırlarca dimdik ayakta kaldı.
languages.original_text: {name} von Valancius took a percentage of the tithe as payment for {mf|his|her} help to the Arbites. The resources were used to construct a void station, the Gem of the Dynasty, a true ornament of the Koronus Expanse. The monumental structure remained standing for centuries after its creator's death.

traits.locale_text: {name} von Valancius, Yargıcılara ettiği yardımın bedeli olarak aşarın bir yüzdesini aldı. Bu kaynaklar, Koronus Enginliği'nin gerçek bir ziyneti olan Hanenin Mücevheri adlı bir uzay istasyonunun inşasında kullanıldı. Bu heybetli yapı, yaratıcısının ölümünden sonra asırlarca dimdik ayakta kaldı.
